detail_desc: Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow elastic straps that cross at the front and adjustable shoulder straps. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sleeveless dress in lace with a V-neck front and back, mesh panels in the sides, concealed zip in one side and V-cut skirt. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, long, wide sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and wide ribbing at the hem.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with wide elastication at the waist, a zip fly and buttons, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight-cut, wide top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and slits in the sides.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides.
Shoulder bag in paper straw with a flap and zip at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 17.5x28 cm.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with flounces. Narrow shoulder straps, one with a flounce trim, a V-neck with a discreet button at the top and a wrapover front. Elastication and a tie at the waist, and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Width of brim 5.5 cm.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted soles.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Straight-style jumper in a soft, loose knit with a wide neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Trousers in a discreetly textured patterned weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with and elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with twisted thread in different colours. Length 5.5 cm.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar, buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with detachable, adjustable straps and fasteners at the top. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs.
Belt in regenerated leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and an all-over print. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and elasticated cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded all-in-one suit in a lightly brushed, patterned weave. Pile-lined hood with a faux fur pompom on top, two concealed zips down the front with a chin guard and elastication at the back of the waist. Foldover mitts at the cuffs and foldover feet at the hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.

Lace push-up bra with narrow, crossover straps at the front and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a hole pattern at the top, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt with a lace trim at the hem. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with gently dropped shoulders and 3/4-length puff sleeves with a frill trim. Gathered, softly draping yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up with a rubber appliqué at the front.

Dungaree shorts in cotton denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a two-part chest pocket, one side with a flap and press-stud, and front and back pockets. Fake fly, and a seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short jacket in a patterned brocade weave with sections in imitation leather made from Piñatex® with a metallic coating. Collar, zip down the front, decorative sparkly stone studs at the top and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining. Piñatex® is an innovative material made from pineapple leaf fibres. The leaves are a byproduct of existing agriculture, turned into a non-woven material that can be used as an alternative to leather.
Jacket in cotton piqué with a lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a grandad collar, button placket and gathers around the neckline. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some mohair with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Push-up bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in wide wale cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and wide, straight legs.
Longer blouse in a woven cupro blend with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric, a lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Partly lined.

Single-breasted jacket in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a zip, and slim, tapered legs with cuffed hems.

Boxy jacket in nylon with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Lined, drawstring hood and a two-way zip down the front. Patch pockets with a flap and one inner pocket. Long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and gently rounded at the back. Lined.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.

Dress in woven fabric with a unique nursing feature, a collar, and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam at the waist and side pockets. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a wide, partly ribbed rubber trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a seam at the hem with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Boots in grained leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Patterned fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Short shorts woven in a stretch viscose blend with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the top to create volume. Zip fly and buttons, side pockets and wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Waist belt in imitation suede with elastication at the back and an adjustable metal buckle fastening. Width 5 cm.
Biker jacket in soft suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-style top in cotton jersey with a boat neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short, fitted, sleeveless jersey dress with crossover shoulder straps. Unlined.
High-waisted lace briefs with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with elastication at the back of the waistband and a tie belt at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases down the front.
Double-layered scarf in patterned silk. Size 9.5x100 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and laser-cut scalloped edges.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Jumper in a textured-knit wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Pencil case with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x6x20 cm.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Gently tapered waist with a detachable tie belt and a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless maxi dress in soft jersey with an open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in thin cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a decorative bow at the hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Top with a rib-trimmed neckline, button placket, and rounded hem with a small fabric appliqué at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, ribbed front and ribbed hems.

Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, short, unlined sleeves and jetted front pockets. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket’s lining is recycled.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, calf-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist and straight legs with frayed, raw-edge hems. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps and flower-shaped appliqués on the front. Bottoms with a wide flounce.
